## type [Config](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/platform/logging/config.go#L6-L12>)

Config captures the runtime configuration for project logging

```go
type Config struct {
    Level         string
    Format        string
    Pretty        bool
    IncludeCaller bool
    DefaultFields map[string]string
}
```
